chinese: 鶉之奔奔、鵲之彊彊。人之無良、我以為兄。
english: Boldly faithful in their pairings are quails;Vigorously so are magpies.This man is all vicious,And I consider him my brother!

chinese: 鵲之彊彊、鶉之奔奔。人之無良、我以為君。
english: Vigorously faithful in their pairings are magpies;Boldly so are quails.This woman is all vicious,And I regard her as marchioness.
